full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 2.5kg Pair (2 x 2.5kg), Turquoise Blue Hex Dumbbells with Anti-Slip Vinyl Coating & Cast-Iron Core, Hand Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

reasoning.strategy: Integrated top keywords 'dumbbells set', 'dumbbells', 'weights dumbbells set', 'dumbbells set women', 'weights for women', 'hand weights for women', and 'neoprene dumbbells set' into natural phrasing. Used 'for women and men' to capture gender-specific searches while maintaining broad appeal. Included key product features like hex shape, vinyl coating, and cast-iron core from verified facts.
